short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your favorite links to show straight in your improved new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gone are the days of misplacing fascinating articles or repeatedly looking for the same webpage. With Simple Tab, you can smoothly organize your preferred sites, ensuring hassle-free access!

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the Simple Tab Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use.
The search results will be provided by Yahoo.

Privacy Policy - https://simple-tab.com/privacy.html
Terms and Conditions - https://simple-tab.com/terms.html
Contact Us - https://simple-tab.com/contact.html
